data_table.description: Cognitive Impairment, Original and Offspring Cohorts, cases reviewed through 2014. Participants whose performance on the MMSE drops 5 or more points across multiple examinations or 3 or more points from the previous examination or who are referred by themselves, their family, a physician from the community or from a FHS ancillary study examination, are flagged for a follow-up neurological and neuropsychological evaluation. Those found to be cognitive impaired by either evaluation are brought to a diagnostic consensus meeting to determine if dementia is evident, and if so, what subtype.

variable.name: idtype
variable.comment: IDTYPE and ID taken together form a unique study participant identification number.

variable.name: demrv096
variable.description: Cognitive status at time of death
variable.value: Greater than or equal to mild dementia
Greater than or equal to moderate dementia

variable.name: demrv103
variable.value: Mixed Dementia Type (Alzheimer's Disease + Vascular Dementia)
Dementia that does not fit any other Category (progressive)
Dementia that does not fit any other Category (non-progressive)

variable.name: demrv124
variable.comment: Code 1 = Probable Vascular Dementia; Codes 2 through 5 = Possible Vascular Dementia. See annotated form for layout of variable value responses.
variable.value: #1 and #2 and #3 = yes, #4 = 1 or 2 'one or more strokes'
#1 and #2 = yes, #3 = no or unknown, #4 or #5 = yes
#1 and #2 and #3 = yes, #4 = no stroke or unknown
#1 = yes and #4 = Extensive White Matter Changes + diagnosis of Binswanger's disease
#1 = yes, #4 = 1, 2 or 3 and/or #5 = yes or #1 = yes and #3 = yes and #4 = 1, 2 or 3 and/or #5 = yes

variable.name: DRFA_09
variable.description: Severity of dementia (based on dementia mini review)
variable.value: Greater than or equal to mild dem
Greater than or equal to moderate dementia
Unknown (Dementia is present, and the pt. is at least mild, but severity is uncertain)
Unknown (Dementia is present, and the pt. is at least mild, but severity is uncertain)

variable.name: dxmilddemdate
variable.description: Date of diagnosis of mild dementia

variable.name: dxmoddemdate
variable.description: Date of diagnosis of moderate dementia

variable.name: dxsevdemdate
variable.description: Date of diagnosis of severe dementia

variable.name: earlydemdate
variable.description: Date of earliest documented date of dementia (based on dementia mini review)

variable.name: lstcogintdate
variable.description: Date last documented to be cognitively intact
